page.title: 18HOLLINGWORTH COUNTRY CENTRE1
page.content: The Country Centre is situated on the site of Hollingworth Primary School. It is served by good bus services and can provide accommodation for up to 40 children. The purpose of the centre is to encourage visitors to understand the countryside in both its leisure and working roles so that children will come to respect and enjoy it. The following activities are available: 1 orienteering 2 animal unit visits 3 seasonal walks - half or full day 4 dairy farm visit - Autumn and Winter 5 seasonal farm studies 6 tree studies 7 soil studies 8 insect studies 9 plant studies 10 church studies 11 village studies Also included is practical work linked with Geography, History, Geology and Biology.
